meanings.definition: Preventing or reducing the buildup of static electricity.
meanings.sent1: Wearing an antistatic wristband helps prevent shocks from static electricity.
meanings.sent2: The antistatic spray made the clothes less likely to cling together.
meanings.sent3: The antistatic socks danced around the room, avoiding any shocking encounters.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was like an antistatic shield, diffusing any tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The antistatic mat was a lifesaver in the electronics workshop, keeping devices safe from static damage.

meanings.definition: A substance or device that prevents or reduces the buildup of static electricity.
meanings.sent1: The technician used an antistatic brush to clean the delicate computer components.
meanings.sent2: She always carried an antistatic cloth in her bag to wipe her phone screen.
meanings.sent3: The antistatic device hummed softly, protecting the computer from electrical surges.
meanings.sent4: The antistatic spray acted like a shield, keeping the sensitive equipment safe.
meanings.sent5: The antistatic wrist strap was a must-have tool for anyone working on electronics.
